article_title: Man killed and four hurt in West Bank IDF raid - Palestinian officials.
sentence: Man  killed  and  four  hurt  in  West  Bank  IDF  raid  -  Palestinian  officials.

article_title: Man killed and four hurt in West Bank IDF raid - Palestinian officials.
sentence: A  32-year-old  man  has  been  killed  and  four  people  seriously  injured  in  an  Israeli  military  raid  in  the  occupied  West  Bank,  according  to  the  Palestinian  health  ministry.

article_title: Man killed and four hurt in West Bank IDF raid - Palestinian officials.
sentence: In  an  update  earlier,  the  ministry  said  the  man  was  shot  and  others  injured  by  Israeli  soldiers  in  Qalandia,  which  is  between  the  West  Bank  city  of  Ramallah  and  Jerusalem.

article_title: Man killed and four hurt in West Bank IDF raid - Palestinian officials.
sentence: According  to  the  UN,  244  Palestinians,  including  65  children,  have  been  killed  by  Israeli  troops  or  settlers  in  the  West  Bank  and  East  Jerusalem  since  7  October.

article_title: Man killed and four hurt in West Bank IDF raid - Palestinian officials.
sentence: Four  Israelis,  including  three  soldiers,  have  been  killed  in  attacks  by  Palestinians  in  the  West  Bank,  and  another  four  in  west  Jerusalem.
